processing.text:
declare @q nvarchar(4000), @key nvarchar(4000), @field varchar(32), @wsID varchar(1), @maxID char(13), @voucherID varchar(8), @datetime0 datetime declare @admin bit, @user int, @joinUnit bit, @joinDept bit, @r int, @i int, @n int, @id1 char(13), @id2 varchar(13), @p int, @c int, @bac int, @count int
select @wsID = rtrim(val) from options where rtrim(name) = 'm_ws_id' select @admin = @@admin, @user = @@userID, @joinUnit = 0, @joinDept = 0, @key = '', @voucherID = 'HCT', @datetime0 = getdate()
-- Check &Checking; if @$mode = 1 begin &StartErrorCount; &InsertErrorTable; select 'bac', a.stt, '00002' from @@table a, (select min(stt) as stt from @@table group by ma_nv, nam, ky) b where a.stt = b.stt and a.bac = 2 &w1;'bac'&w2;a.stt&w3;'00002'&w4; group by a.stt &EndErrorCount; end else begin select @field = 'bac', @r = min(a.stt) from @@table a, (select min(stt) as stt from @@table group by ma_nv, nam, ky) b where a.stt = b.stt and a.bac = 2&Error; end &EndErrorMode;
-- Key if @@admin = 0 begin if @type = '1' begin if @@sysDatabaseName.dbo.AI_ERP$System$GetAuthorize(@@admin, @@userID, 'hrAMCriteria', 'Edit') = 0 select @type = '0' end
exec AI_ERP$HRM$DeptRightFilter @user, @admin, 'e', 'e', '@@sysDatabaseName', @key output, @joinUnit output, @joinDept output select @key = dbo.AI_ERP$Function$System$GetCheckKey(@key) select @key = case when @key = '' then '' else ' where (' + @key + ')' end end
-- Gather select top 0 a.stt_rec as stt_rec_nv, a.nam, a.ky, a.ghi_chu, b.bac, b.chi_tieu, b.muc_tieu, b.trong_so, b.dien_giai, b.ma_loai, b.line_nbr as stt into #r from hrkbctdg a, hrkbctdgct b
select @q = 'insert into #r select e.stt_rec, a.nam, a.ky, a.ghi_chu, a.bac, a.chi_tieu, a.muc_tieu, a.trong_so, a.dien_giai, a.ma_loai, a.stt' select @q = @q + ' from @@table a join hrnv e on a.ma_nv = e.ma_nv' + @key exec sp_executesql @q
if @type = '0' delete #r from #r a where exists(select 1 from hrkbctdg b where a.stt_rec_nv = b.stt_rec_nv and a.nam = b.nam and a.ky = b.ky)
create table #id(stt_rec char(13), stt_rec_nv char(13), nam int, ky int, stt int, id int identity(1, 1)) insert into #id(stt_rec_nv, nam, ky, stt) select stt_rec_nv, nam, ky, min(stt) from #r group by stt_rec_nv, nam, ky
select @count = count(*) from #id exec AI_ERP$App$UpdateIdentityNumber @wsID, @voucherID, @count, @user
select top 0 stt_rec, stt, stt0, chi_tieu, muc_tieu, trong_so, dien_giai, ma_loai, bac, line_nbr, cast(null as int) as row, identity(int, 1, 1) as id into #d from hrkbctdgct
insert into #d(stt_rec, stt, stt0, chi_tieu, muc_tieu, trong_so, dien_giai, ma_loai, bac, line_nbr, row) select b.stt_rec, '', '', a.chi_tieu, a.muc_tieu, a.trong_so, a.dien_giai, a.ma_loai, a.bac, 0, a.stt from #r a join #id b on a.stt_rec_nv = b.stt_rec_nv and a.nam = b.nam and a.ky = b.ky order by a.stt_rec_nv, a.nam, a.ky, a.stt
select top 1 @n = id from #d order by id desc select @i = 1, @id2 = '', @p = 1, @c = 0, @r = 1 while @i <= @n begin select @id1 = stt_rec, @bac = bac from #d where id = @i if @id1 = @id2 begin if @bac = 1 select @p = @p + 1, @c = 0 else select @c = @c + 1 end else select @p = 1, @c = 0, @id2 = @id1, @r = 1 update #d set stt = ltrim(str(@p)) + case when @bac = 1 then '' else '.' + ltrim(str(@c)) end, line_nbr = @r, stt0 = case when @bac = 2 then ltrim(str(@p)) else '' end where id = @i select @i = @i + 1, @r = @r + 1 end
select b.stt_rec, a.* into #k from #r a join hrkbctdg b on a.stt_rec_nv = b.stt_rec_nv and a.nam = b.nam and a.ky = b.ky delete #r from #r a where exists(select 1 from #k b where a.stt_rec_nv = b.stt_rec_nv and a.nam = b.nam and a.ky = b.ky)
create table #id2(stt_rec char(13), stt_rec_nv char(13), nam int, ky int, stt int, id int identity(1, 1)) insert into #id2(stt_rec, stt_rec_nv, nam, ky, stt) select b.stt_rec, a.stt_rec_nv, a.nam, a.ky, stt from #k a join hrkbctdg b on a.stt_rec_nv = b.stt_rec_nv and a.nam = b.nam and a.ky = b.ky group by a.stt_rec_nv, a.nam, a.ky, a.stt, b.stt_rec
select distinct b.stt_rec, a.stt, a.stt0, a.chi_tieu, a.muc_tieu, a.trong_so, a.dien_giai, a.ma_loai, a.bac, a.line_nbr, a.row into #d2 from #d a join #id2 b on a.row = b.stt join hrkbctdgct c on b.stt_rec = c.stt_rec delete #d from #d a where exists(select 1 from #d2 b where a.row = b.row)
-- Insert @@inserting(master); a join #id b on a.stt = b.stt @@inserting(detail); order by stt_rec, line_nbr
if @type = '1' begin update hrkbctdg set @@list(master); from hrkbctdg a join #k b on a.stt_rec = b.stt_rec
delete hrkbctdgct from hrkbctdgct a where exists(select 1 from #d2 b where a.stt_rec = b.stt_rec)
truncate table #d insert into #d select * from #d2
@@inserting(detail); order by stt_rec, line_nbr end
